participant_1.background: my current goal is to run a k. i make straight as in school. i won homecoming queen this year. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i am currently in high school.

participant_2.background: i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i dye my hair every three months.

content.text: hello, how are you? what do you do for a living? I am a homecoming queen
